alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 5:31PM EDT until May 09 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Northampton County in northeastern North Carolina... Southern Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Southwestern Brunswick County in south central Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 531 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Brodnax to 7 miles southwest of South Hill to near Clarksville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Brodnax and La Crosse around 535 PM EDT. Ebony around 550 PM EDT. Gasburg around 555 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Beechwood, Bowens Corner, Henrico, John H Kerr Dam, Finchley, White Plains, Skipwith, Forksville, Richardson and Bracey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
